item.title: FHN
item.description: score:103 Chances: First Horizon has an impressive earnings surprise history and currently possesses the right combination of the two key ingredients for a likely beat in its next quarterly report. The company has been awarded national Gold level recognition for its commitments to employee health and well-being as measured in the American Heart Association’s 2023 Workforce Well-being Scorecardâ„¢.

item.title: RF
item.description: score:284 Chances: Regions Bank services designed to help people impacted by recent storms in Tennessee and Kentucky. Bank stocks are enjoying the chatter about potential interest-rate cuts at the Fed, which could benefit Regions Financial Corp. Initiatives to support veterans, equip family business owners, and teach financial literacy are creating positive community impact and potential long-term customer relationships.
